title: A rich mans war but a poor mans fight - example

content.prompt: The belief by some Americans that the Civil War was “a rich man’s war but a poor man’s fight” was reflected in

choices.label: the draft riots in New York City
Lincoln’s suspension of habeas corpus in the South

topic.text: 5.8: Military Conflict in the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
